name: Private Limited Company
shortDescription: Private Limited Company is a type of company that offers limited liability or legal protection for members.
description: A private limited company is a type of company that offers limited liability or legal protection for members. A private company does not offer or trade its shares to the general public on the stock exchanges. The governing body for such a company is the Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA). The Companies Act restricts the right to transfer its shares and prohibits any invitation to the public to subscribe for any securities of the company.

content.title: Get Registration Certificate
content.description: Lawyer will Follow-up and Respond to any objections raised and get your Registration Certificate

deliverables.heading: Deliverables for Incorporating a Private Limited Company

content.description: Digital Signature Certificate for 1 Director
Directors Identification Number for 1 Director
Name Approval Certificate
Articles of Association and Memorandum of Association
Certification of Incorporation
PAN Number
TAN Number
GST Registration
PF Registration
ESI Registration
AXIS or ICICI Zero Balance Current Account

benefits.heading: Benefits of Incorporating a Private Limited Company

content.title: Limited Liability
content.description: Private limited companies are a separate legal entity to their shareholders and directors. In a private limited company, the liability of each member or shareholder is limited.

content.title: No Minimum capital
content.description: A private limited company can be started with zero paid up capital as there is no minimum capital required for incorporating a private limited company.

content.title: Perpetual Succession
content.description: According to company law, perpetual succession means that the company continues its existence even if any owner or member dies, goes bankrupt, exits from the business and transfers his shares.

content.title: Builds Credibility
content.description: The particulars of the company are available on public database, which helps builds credibility and brings transparency to the operation of company.

processSteps.step: Apply for a Directors Identification Number (DIN)
Check company name availability and apply for name reservation
Apply for incorporation using Form SPICe (INC-32)
Obtain a PAN and TAN for the company

prerequisites.heading: Prerequisites for Incorporating a Private Limited Company

content.description: There should be minimum of two shareholders to register a Private Limited Company.
There should be minimum of two directors in a Private Limited Company.  Each director must have a Directors Identification Number (DIN)
There should be minimum of two members and a maximum of 200 Members to register.
There is no minimum limit of Paid-up capital to form Private Limited Company but the Authorized capital of minimum Rs. 1 lakh is mandatory.
Permanent Account Number (PAN)

faqs.question: What is the Director Identification Number (DIN)?
faqs.answer: DIN is a unique Identification Number allotted to an individual who is appointed as a director of a company.

faqs.question: What are the qualifications of a director?
faqs.answer: The director must be a natural person. Must have attained the age of maturity (18 years). There is no bar over the nationality of the director.

faqs.question: Can Private Limited Company have FDI?
faqs.answer: Yes, a Private Limited Company is allowed to have Foreign Direct Investment or FDI.

faqs.question: What is SPICe Form?
faqs.answer: The Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) introduced the SPICe Form INC-32 (Simplified Proforma for Incorporating Company Electronically). It helps in incorporation of company by the use of a single application.

faqs.question: If I have questions regarding my documents or the process, how can I ask?
faqs.answer: Once you purchase any product from the ezyLegal website, you will be credited minutes in your account. You can use these minutes to connect with the Lawyer and ask questions and take guidance from the Expert.

faqs.question: How to register a Private Limited Company in India?
faqs.answer: ezyLegal can help you get your Private Limited Company registered and provide you with the right legal guidance. You can schedule your Consultation with an ezyLegal Lawyer and know the detailed process and advantages of registering a Private Limited Company.

faqs.question: How will I know the status of the registration process?
faqs.answer: Status updates will be available on the ezyLegal website (www.ezylegal.in) in your secured Account. Additionally, you will be notified on email and WhatsApp.
